item.description:
Moutain Goat Fans,

You can't miss out on seeing the Mountain Goats at the MFA next month. I want to setup a meetup after the show at a restaurant or bar in the area. I don't know too much about the Northeastern or MFA area so if anyone has any recommendations - that would be great. The show starts at 7:30 and will probably be over around 10.

It looks like the show is sold out, so hopefully you already have your tickets.

If you aren't familiar with the Moutain Goats, visit their myspace page and listen to a few songs - perhaps you can convince someone on craigslist to sell their ticket.

Moutain Goats

If you want to meetup before or after the show - RSVP and give me a call - (701) 331-0920

Hope to see you at the MFA on the 15th.

Michael

About this Meetup
item.how_to_find_us: Give me a call and I'll give you our location
item.why: Get to know other Moutain Goat fans in Boston - How often does that happen?
item.name: Moutain Goats - MFA - March 14th
